Interface NoticeboardDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
PostgresNoticeboardDAO
public interface NoticeboardDAO

Manages the fundamental Database operations for Noticeboard objects.

  • Method Summary

  • Method Details

    • getNoticeboardIDsByUserID

      List<Integer> getNoticeboardIDsByUserID(int userID)

      Gets a list of all the Noticeboard IDs owned by a User.

      Parameters:
      userID - the User's ID
      Returns:
      a List of Integer of all Noticeboard IDs.

    • loadNoticeboardsByUserID

      int loadNoticeboardsByUserID(int userID, List<Noticeboard> boards)

      Loads a User's Noticeboards and their ToDos.

      Parameters:
      userID - the User's ID
      boards - a List object to load the Noticeboard objects into
      Returns:
      0 if successful, otherwise -1.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if boards==null

    • loadNoticeboardByBoardID

      Noticeboard loadNoticeboardByBoardID(int boardID)

      Loads a User's Noticeboard with its ToDos.

      Parameters:
      boardID - the Noticeboard's ID
      Returns:
      the Noticeboard if successful, null otherwise

    • getNoticeboardsMetadataByUserID

      int getNoticeboardsMetadataByUserID(int userID, List<Noticeboard> boards)

      Gets the metadata of the Noticeboards owned by a User.

      Parameters:
      userID - the User's ID
      boards - a List object to load the Noticeboard objects into
      Returns:
      0 if successful, otherwise -1.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if boards==null

    • getNoticeboardMetadataByBoardID

      Noticeboard getNoticeboardMetadataByBoardID(int boardID)

      Gets the metadata of a Noticeboard.

      Parameters:
      boardID - the Noticeboard's ID
      Returns:
      the Noticeboard, otherwise null.

    • addNoticeboard

      int addNoticeboard(String title, String description, int userID)

      Adds a Noticeboard to the system.

      Parameters:
      title - the Noticeboard's title
      description - the Noticeboard's description
      userID - the owning User's ID
      Returns:
      the Noticeboard's ID if successful, otherwise returns -1.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the Noticeboard's title is not valid or if either the title or description are too long
      IllegalArgumentException - if no User with the ID userID exists
      IllegalStateException - if a Noticeboard with the same title exists already

    • updateNoticeboard

      void updateNoticeboard(NoticeboardDTO board)

      Updates the metadata of a Noticeboard.

      Parameters:
      board - the new Noticeboard's metadata
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if the target Noticeboard does not exist
      IllegalArgumentException - if the title is not valid or if either the title or description are too long
      IllegalStateException - if the title is already used by another Noticeboard

    • updateNoticeboardTitle

      void updateNoticeboardTitle(String newTitle, int boardID)

      Changes the title of a noticeboard.

      Parameters:
      newTitle - the new title
      boardID - the Noticeboard's ID
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if the target Noticeboard does not exist
      IllegalStateException - if the title is already used by another Noticeboard
      IllegalArgumentException - if the title is not valid or if it's too long

    • updateNoticeboardDescription

      void updateNoticeboardDescription(String newDescription, int boardID)

      Changes the description of a Noticeboard.

      Parameters:
      newDescription - the new description
      boardID - the Noticeboard's ID
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if the target Noticeboard does not exist
      IllegalArgumentException - if the description is too long

    • removeNoticeboard

      void removeNoticeboard(int boardID)

      Removes a Noticeboard from the system.

      Parameters:
      boardID - the Noticeboard's ID
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if the target Noticeboard does not exist
